column1: "Info": "The Honda Civic is a compact car produced by the Japanese automaker Honda. It has been in production since 1972 and has gained a reputation for reliability
column3: and sporty handling. The Civic is known for its sleek and modern design
column4: with various body styles available including sedan

column1: "Info": "The Honda Accord is a mid-size car that has been in production since 1976. It is known for its reliability
column3: and comfortable ride. The Accord is available in both sedan and coupe models
column4: and comes with a variety of engine options. It is also known for its advanced safety features and modern technology
column5: including Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility. "

column1: "Info": "The Honda CR-V is a compact SUV that is known for its reliability and practicality. It has a spacious interior with comfortable seating and plenty of cargo space. It offers a smooth and quiet ride with good fuel efficiency. The CR-V is equipped with advanced safety features and has a reputation for being one of the safest vehicles in its class. It is a popular choice for families and anyone who values a reliable and practical vehicle."
"Info": "The Honda Pilot is a mid-size crossover SUV that offers a spacious and comfortable cabin
column3: and a wide range of features and technologies for comfort
column5: and safety. It can accommodate up to eight passengers and offers plenty of cargo space
column6: making it a great choice for families and adventurers who need versatility and reliability."

column1: "Info": "The Honda Ridgeline is a mid-size pickup truck that combines the utility and versatility of a traditional truck with the comfort and convenience of an SUV. It features a unibody construction
column3: and a versatile cargo bed with a dual-action tailgate and an in-bed trunk. "
